Pre-Game Insights: Dave Roberts heading into Sunday’s bullpen game: “We have potentially two games here, and I feel that to prevent runs, we’re in a very good spot.”

The Dodgers leverage relievers are certainly well-rested, after Roberts wasn’t as urgent to relieve Jack Flaherty before Game 5 got away,Manager Dave Roberts said Saturday at Dodger Stadium, “I think across baseball, managers are being more aggressive once they catch a lead and going with those [high-leverage] guys, and it’s just hard to get back into a game or tack on,”
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers have gotten more looks at Mets relievers than the Mets have at Dodgers relievers
Since 2019 in the postseason, batters when facing relievers a third time or more are hitting.274/.340/.483 in 426 plate appearances, per Sarah Langs at MLB.com and MLB Network research.
Others: The Dodgers will rely heavily on its high-leverage relievers to get the one win they need to secure the pennant
The team will use a bullpen game for Game 6 on Sunday
